wikipedia_page.main: Mairéad Carlin is an Irish singer. She is a former member of the ensemble Celtic Woman and was the first-ever member of the group that was born in Northern Ireland.

response: * Mairéad Carlin   Máiréad Carlin is a singer from Derry. From August 2013, she replaced Chloë Agnew, who would be working on solo projects. In January 2021 She announced via her social channels that she had decided to leave Celtic Woman to pursue other projects.
In October 2019, Susan rejoined Celtic Woman  for a few shows  filling in for Máiréad Carlin while she recovered from appendicitis.
